name: Walking on the Mood
description:
Every story calls another story, and the remaining memories are these moon and stars, shining upon our sky…. Let me tell you the story of « Walking on the Mood »… 

Ten years ago, back in July 2009, way before our video game making era, I was working on a youth space camp project, with this very idea to commemorate the 40th anniversary of the first moonwalk ever… 

We wanted to really make it as unforgettable as possible and we launched, well, messages and signals around the world, like a thousand bottles, say satellites or drones, to bring amazing people around this space camp. 

10 years later, we eventually made a video game out of it... 

It is called "Walking on  the Mood"
